name: Elias Larkin
title: Global Digital Marketing Director
quote: Derek leads with the business objective, builds a clear path to get there, and communicates every step along the way. He delivers on schedule and with a level of intention that consistently drives meaningful results. His mix of strategic thinking, clarity, and genuine enthusiasm makes him an exceptional partner.

name: Bryan Klavitter
title: VP of Global Marketing & Customer Insights
quote: Derek has an exceptional ability to merge creative vision with technical precision, delivering websites that not only look stunning but also achieve measurable business outcomes. Derek’s approach is grounded in design best practices and informed by data-driven insights, ensuring every solution enhances user experience and brand engagement. Derek is a trusted partner for any organization seeking to elevate their digital presence.

name: Maria Baez
title: Adventure Kitty Founder & Business Owner
quote: Derek completely transformed my Shopify store and gave it a fresh, modern look that finally feels like my brand. He was super easy to work with. Always clear, communicative, and fast to respond. Traffic to the site has gone up since the redesign, and I’ve had so many compliments on how fun and engaging it looks.
